tetra/schema/sword/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schema/sword/socket.description: Socket a gem into the sword, providing different effects depending on the gem.
tetra.module.sword/socket.name: Socket
tetra.module.sword/socket.description: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.

tetra/schema/sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra/schema/sword/counterweight.descrip: Balance the blade with a counterweight. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
tetra.module.sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra.module.sword/counterweight.descrip: A counterweight attached to the bottom of the hilt. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
tetra/schema/sword/reinforced_fuller.des: Reinforce the fuller using the given material. Provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra.module.sword/reinforced_fuller.des: A fuller reinforcement that provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra/schema/sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/sword/binding.description: Tighten the binding between the hilt and the blade by wrapping it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra.variant.sword_binding/string.descr: Tightly bound strings strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra.variant.sword_binding/leather.desc: Tightly bound leather straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra.variant.sword_binding/hide.descrip: Tightly bound hide straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra.variant.sword_binding/vine.descrip: Tightly bound vine straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra.variant.sword_binding/bolt.descrip: An adjustable bolt attaches the blade to the hilt.
tetra.tweak.sword_tweak/binding_bolt.too:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the sword more stiff, increasing damage.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
tetra/schema/sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
tetra/schema/sword/forefinger_ring.descr: Attach a ring at the top of the hilt, greatly increasing grip. Increases the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra.module.sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
tetra.module.sword/forefinger_ring.descr: A ring has been attached at the top of the hilt. The ring allows for a better grip, increasing the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra/schema/sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra/schema/sword/grip_loop.description: Attach a loop at the end of the hilt, which increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra.module.sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra.module.sword/grip_loop.description: A loop attached at the end of the hilt that increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra/schema/sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra/schema/sword/short_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with a blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade. Allows the wielder to swing at a faster rate, but deals slightly less damage per swing compared to a regular blade. The short blade is not capable of sweeping attacks.
tetra.module.sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra.module.sword/short_blade.descripti: A blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade, allows for a faster swing rate but deals slightly less damage per swing.
tetra/schema/sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra/schema/sword/heavy_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with a large and hefty blade. Sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
tetra.module.sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra.module.sword/heavy_blade.descripti: A large and hefty blade that sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
tetra/schema/sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra/schema/sword/machete.description: Replace the current sword blade with a machete forged from the provided material, which can be used to cut down plants in an area. The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra.module.sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra.module.sword/machete.description:
A machete which can be used to cut down plants in an area, it deals average damage and has an average attack speed.

The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.

tetra.module.sword/stonecutter.descripti: A heavy blade that cuts through stone with ease.

tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_0.name: Woolen sash

Weaving a sash out of wool should provide better support than simply tying a rope around your waist.

Using a quick latch mechanism for locking the strap in place allows faster access to the tool held by the strap.

§7Tapping the toolbelt access hotkey will attempt to equip the first item suitable for breaking or salvaging the block you're looking at. Tools can only be equipped from slots with this upgrade.

Upgrade the quiver with a quick latch mechanism, allowing quicker access to arrows in the quiver.

§7Drawing a bow with no ammo available will automatically grab an arrow from the first stack in the quiver.
tetra.improvement.quiver/quick_latch.des: Arrows will be automatically drawn from this quiver when no ammo is available.

§7Held items can be put into the pouch using the restock hotkey.

§8§oTetra begins
tetra.advancements.spelunking.root.title: Spelunking
tetra.advancements.spelunking.ancient_ru: Find ancient ruins deep down in a cold biome

Find a thermal cell in the ancient ruins

tetra.advancements.spelunking.fuel_hamme: Fuel up a forge hammer using charged thermal cells
tetra.advancements.spelunking.geode.desc: Find a geode in the depths
tetra.advancements.spelunking.geode_open: Upgrade a mallet and use it to break open a geode at a workbench
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_con: Configure a forge hammer to provide tier 5 hammering
tetra.advancements.spelunking.hammer_cra: Use a forge hammer to craft a module requiring tier 4 hammering

tetra.advancements.spelunking.loot_ruins: Successfully harvest flooring from the ancient ruins

tetra.advancements.spelunking.refill_cel: Use a transfer unit or a core extractor to fully charge a thermal cell
tetra.advancements.spelunking.stonecutte: Find a stonecutter and attach it to a hilt
tetra.advancements.spelunking.use_bolt.d: Use a bolt to bind a tool or a sword, then use the tweak tab in a workbench to change the stats of the item
tetra.advancements.upgrades.root.title: Basic Tinkering

Craft a mallet from sticks and logs

Item Reward: Holosphere
Upgrade a bow in a workbench
tetra.advancements.upgrades.double_heade: When using double headed tools (e.g. pickaxes, axes, hammers) it's only the head with the highest value that will be considered when determining damage or harvest efficiency.
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_2.des: Smelt stone and use it to craft a double-sided hammer head
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_3.des: Gain access to the third hammer tier by crafting a double sided iron hammer
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_4.des: Use a forge hammer to craft a module requiring tier 4 hammering
tetra.advancements.upgrades.hammer_go.de: Figure out how to use a forge hammer to craft an obsidian hammer
tetra.advancements.upgrades.repairs.desc:
Modular items can be repaired in a workbench.
 * Repairing an item will require materials (and appropriate tools) for one of its modules
 * Repairing will cycle over all of the item's modules
 * Repairing magically unstable modules will cost experience
 * Each repair fully restores the durability of the item
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_hone.d: Use a sword until it can be honed, then hone it at a workbench
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_hone_p: Hone the speed or damage of a hilt or a blade to level 5
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_improv: Apply an improvement to a sword module, and then hone that improvement to increase its effect
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_integr: Upgrade a sword's hilt or strengthen the sword with a binding to increase its integrity
tetra.advancements.upgrades.sword_upgrad: Place a vanilla sword in a workbench and upgrade it
tetra.advancements.upgrades.toolbelt.des: Find a way to easily access your tools
tetra.advancements.upgrades.tool_upgrade: Place a vanilla tool such as a pickaxe, axe or a hoe in a workbench and upgrade it
tetra.advancements.upgrades.workbench.de: Upgrade a crafting table by right-clicking it with a mallet
